cast.name: 吉姆·艾尔-哈利利 Jim Al-Khalili

this_title: Britain's Nuclear Bomb: The Inside Story
trans_title: 英国第一颗氢弹：内部故事
introduction: In 1957, Britain exploded its first megaton hydrogen bomb - codenamed Operation Grapple X. It was the culmination of an extraordinary scientific project, which against almost insuperable odds turned Britain into a nuclear superpower. This is the inside story of how Britain got 'the bomb'.The BBC has been granted unprecedented access to the top-secret nuclear research facility at Aldermaston. The programme features interviews with veterans and scientists who took part in the atomic bomb programme, some speaking for the first time, and newly released footage of the British atomic bomb tests.
chinese_title: 英国第一颗氢弹：内部故事
foreign_title: Britain's Nuclear Bomb: The Inside Story
